website_summaries.verdict: Top option with lift-away canister. Sucks dirt out of carpets, rugs, and floors.
pros: Nearly all reviews mention amazing suction power for floors, carpets, and rugs
Additional tools make it a breeze to clean stairs, ceiling corners, furniture, and other clunky places
Some say it does the same job as the most expensive vacuums
cons: Some are annoyed that it tips over easily
You'll need to clean the bristle roll and filters every few months

customer_reviews.title: Buy this and buy it now!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her birthday when hers broke. She has a 3 yr old and a dog. She said the first time she used it the amount of hair and dirt it picked up was embarrassing. Her last vacuum was a highly rated upright and less than a year old but after using this vacuum just once the difference is amazing. With her other vacuum, whenever she would shampoo her carpets she had to keep stopping to clean fur and hair off the carpet shampooer. After using the Shark just once she shampooed her carpets and there was NO ground in dirt or hair to pick up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum is great.  However, the ad on line was not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: The online ad showed a photo and listed the floor cleaner attachment as part of the package. It was not included in the box with the vacuum. The pet hair attachment was pictured, but not listed in the ad. The pet hair attachment came with the vacuum, but not the floor attachment. I would think if the attachment is pictured and/or listed in the ad, it should be included. The Shark Navigator Pro does a very nice job cleaning floors, rugs, carpet and stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My second one. Hope it lasts longer than the ...
customer_reviews.text: My second one. Hope it lasts longer than the first one. It works very well and fits in places other vacuums will not.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Pad

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little vacuum. We have a dyson and the little shark way outperforms it. It has a small head so it takes longer to clean but fits more places. The pieces come apart and go back together easily and it’s easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cooper

customer_reviews.title: The vacuum arrived a day early and was very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum arrived a day early and was very easy to assemble. I have both Cystic Fibrosis and asthma so it’s important that my vacuum really perform well. This blows all the other vacuums I have owned out of the water! Super light and the extra tools were a huge bonus for cleaning different surfaces. This vacuum got up more dust and dog hair than I imagined was even in my carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Lee Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great for deep cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans better than any vacuum I have ever had. Even better than the Kirby.
customer_reviews.author: Busygranny46

customer_reviews.title: Love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum. Love the canister and no need to purchase bags. Easy to assemble. Some of the attachments were missing. Emailed the company and they sent them right out.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy G.

customer_reviews.title: It's not what I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this every time you take and use the hose the vacuum tips over, its designed very poorly not to mention the cord to plug it in is at the bottom so your always getting it tangled up in the Vacuum, Would I recommend this to anyone, maybe to somebody I didn't like very well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: Hard to manipulate
customer_reviews.text: Worst vacuum I’ve ever had. The swiveling canister cannot be locked into place and is like a 20lb weight pulling to the sides when trying to vacuum. Extremely difficult to navigate!! Ironically it’s called the “Navigator “!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suction not the same after only 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I've had the vacuum only about 2 years and the suction is not nearly as good as when I first bought it. And yes, I have cleaned all the filters. I would think a vacuum should last more than 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: No hard floor attachment, but works splendidly on carpet.
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these several years ago and it lasted several years, so decided to get another one. The original had a separate hard floor attachment that used pads and it was fantastic. This one doesn't have that, you have to pay extra to get one. When we bought this one, it was delivered today and we love it (in spite of no hard floor attachment). It actually "fluffs up" the carpet (strong suction!!) and after having used another, less expensive, Shark, it was amazing how much pet hair and dust came out! We bought this one from Walmart, but would have used Amazon if the price was a little lower.
customer_reviews.author: LacelleTop Contributor: Baking

product_meta.title: UPRIGHT VACUUM
product_meta.description: The Shark Professional Navigator Lift-Away Upright Vacuum NV355 provides powerful deep carpet and bare floor cleaning. Its innovative interior never loses suction, even in the presence of tough messes like pet fur or soil. Cleaning has never been faster or easier with the lightweight upright vacuum's unique, large-capacity portable canister. With an exclusive Dust-Away hard floor attachment, it's easy to remove dust and debris from hardwood, linoleum and other firm surfaces. Turn the brushroll on or off with just the click of a button to switch between various surfaces. The Shark Professional upright vacuum is lightweight and steerable. Its built-in Anti-Allergen Complete Seal technology traps over 99.99 percent of dust and allergens inside the vacuum, not back into the air you breathe. This Shark Professional Navigator Lift-Away Upright Vacuum NV355 comes with a pre-installed lifetime HEPA filter.
feature_bullets: Never Loses Suction technology ensures that you don't experience plugs or clogs
Lightweight, extra-large capacity portable canister can handle large messes effortlessly
Anti-Allergen Complete Seal Technology + HEPA helps to reduce airborne allergens for a cleaner home
Dust-Away bare floor attachment comes with 1 microfiber pad for more thorough cleaning Swivel steering: easy to maneuver into tight spaces and crevices
Keep your home clean with the Shark Professional upright vacuum HEPA filtration helps to improve overall indoor air quality Handheld portion makes cleaning stairs and other graded surfaces simple

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars15 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
